```{r}
#This function should use a given pdf and return a random sample size, specified by the user, from said pdf. 
# @Parameter n is the desired number of samples
# @Parameter pdf is the pdf of the random variable that you wish to sample from
# @Parameter a is the lower bound of the random variable
# @Parameter b is the upper bound of the random variable
# @Parameter C is the number that f(x) <= C for all x 
```

```{r}
# An example of this function would be if you wanted to sample from a random variable with pdf 3x, you would input:
pdf <- function(x) {3*x}
a <- 0
b <- 1
c <- 0.5
n <- 100
accept.reject(n,pdf,a,b,c)

###Should return values of the samples. 

```
